name: SomeWhere in the Dark (Vlada123Cz)
description:
Story:

You're driving out of a party when a car suddenly dies in here and you're looking for a way to get home from this weird place where no one is.

In total there is 6 endings.

This game takes  about 2 - 10 minutes, which depends on the ending.

Controls:

Walk[WSAD]Interact[E]Flashlight[F]Quit Game[ESC]

Boring things:

This is my first game ever made so don't judge me pls. Thx <3.
